trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: New-JobTrigger
trans-unit.target: New-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: New-JobTrigger
trans-unit.target: New-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Creates a job trigger for a scheduled job
trans-unit.target: 建立排程工作的工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Once (Default)
trans-unit.target: 一次 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: Daily
trans-unit.target: 每天

trans-unit.source: Weekly
trans-unit.target: 每週

trans-unit.source: AtLogon
trans-unit.target: AtLogon

trans-unit.source: AtStartup
trans-unit.target: AtStartup

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **New-JobTrigger** cmdlet creates a "job trigger" that starts a scheduled job on a one-time or recurring schedule, or when an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: **New-jobtrigger** 指令程式會建立 「 工作觸發程序 「 一次性或週期性的排程，或在事件發生時啟動排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **ScheduledJobTrigger** object that **New-JobTrigger** returns to set a job trigger for a new or existing scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **ScheduledJobTrigger** 物件 **New-jobtrigger** 設定新的或現有的排程工作的工作觸發程序傳回。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a job trigger by using the Get-JobTrigger cmdlet to get the job trigger of an existing scheduled job, or by using a hash table value to represent a job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 來取得現有排程工作的工作觸發程序或使用雜湊表值來代表工作觸發程序，您也可以建立工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: When creating a job trigger, review the default values of the options specified by the New-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 在建立工作觸發程序時，檢閱 New-scheduledjoboption 指令程式所指定之選項的預設值。

trans-unit.source: These options, which have the same valid and default values as the corresponding options in **Task Scheduler**, affect the scheduling and timing of scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項，其中有相同的有效和預設值為對應的選項，在 **工作排程器**, ，會影響排程和排程工作的時機。

trans-unit.source: **New-JobTrigger** is one of a collection of job scheduling cmdlets in the PSScheduledJob module that is included in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **新 JobTrigger** 是 Windows PowerShell 所包含 PSScheduledJob 模組中工作排程 cmdlet 集合之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Scheduled Jobs, see the About topics in the PSScheduledJob module.
trans-unit.target: 如需排程工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 PSScheduledJob 模組中的「關於」主題。

trans-unit.source: Import the PSScheduledJob module and then type: `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` or see about_Scheduled_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，然後輸入︰ `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` 或請參閱 about_Scheduled_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Once Schedule
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 一次排程

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **New-JobTrigger** cmdlet to create a job trigger that starts a scheduled job only one time.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **New-jobtrigger** 指令程式可建立一次只能啟動排程的工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **At** parameter is a string that Windows PowerShell converts into a **DateTime** object.
trans-unit.target: 值 **在** 參數是 Windows PowerShell 將轉換成一個字串 **DateTime** 物件。

trans-unit.source: The **At** parameter value includes an explicit date, not just a time.
trans-unit.target: **在** 參數值包含明確的日期，不只一次。

trans-unit.source: If the date were omitted, the trigger would be created with the current date and 3:00 AM time, which is likely to represent a time in the past.
trans-unit.target: 若省略日期，則會以目前日期與上午 3:00 的時間建立觸發程序，這可能代表過去的時間。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Daily Schedule
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 每日排程

trans-unit.source: This command creates a job trigger that starts a scheduled job every 3 days at 4:15 a.m.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立每隔 3 天在上午 4:15 啟動排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of the **At** parameter does not include a date, the current date is used as the date value in the **DateTime** object.
trans-unit.target: 因為值 **在** 參數不包含日期、 目前日期作為中的日期值 **DateTime** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the date and time is in the past, the scheduled job is started at the next occurrence, which is 3 days later from the **At** parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 排程的工作的日期和時間已經過去，如果會在稍後從 3 天的下一個項目啟動 **在** 參數值。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Weekly Schedule
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 每週排程

trans-unit.source: This command creates a job trigger that starts a scheduled job every 4 weeks on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday at 2300 hours (11:00 PM).
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立每隔四週在星期一、星期三與星期五 23:00 (下午 11:00) 啟動排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: You can also enter the **DaysOfWeek** parameter value in integers, such as "`-DaysOfWeek 1, 5`".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以輸入 **DaysOfWeek** 參數值中的整數，例如 「`-DaysOfWeek 1, 5`」。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Logon Schedule
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 登入排程

trans-unit.source: This command creates a job trigger that starts a scheduled job whenever the domain administrator logs onto the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立在網域系統管理員登入電腦時執行排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Using a Random Delay
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 使用隨機的延遲

trans-unit.source: This command creates a job trigger that starts a scheduled job every day at 1:00 in the morning.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立在每天凌晨 1:00 啟動排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the **RandomDelay** parameter to set the maximum delay to 20 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **RandomDelay** 參數設定為 20 分鐘的延遲時間上限。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the job runs every day between 1:00 AM and 1:20 AM, with the interval varying pseudo-randomly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，該工作會在每天凌晨 1:00 到凌晨 1:20 之間執行，且間隔為隨機指定。

trans-unit.source: You can use a random delay for sampling, load balancing, and other administrative tasks.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將隨機延遲用於取樣、負載平衡與其他系統管理工作。

trans-unit.source: When setting the delay value, review the effective and default values of the New-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet and coordinate the delay with the option settings.
trans-unit.target: 設定延遲值時，檢閱預設 New-scheduledjoboption 指令程式的值和協調使用的選項設定延遲。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Create a Job Trigger for a New Scheduled Job
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 建立新的排定工作的工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: These commands use a job trigger to create a new scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令使用工作觸發程序來建立新的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Add a Job Trigger to a Scheduled Job
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 新增工作觸發程序至排程工作

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to add a job trigger to an existing scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何將工作觸發程序新增到現有的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple job triggers to any scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將多個工作觸發程序新增到任何排程工作。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Add-JobTrigger cmdlet to add the job trigger to the SynchronizeApps scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Add-jobtrigger 指令程式新增到 SynchronizeApps 排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **Trigger** parameter is a **New-JobTrigger** command that runs the job every day at 3:10 AM.
trans-unit.target: 值 **觸發程序** 參數是 **New-jobtrigger** 上午 3:10 執行每日工作的命令。

trans-unit.source: When the command completes, SynchronizeApps is a scheduled job that runs at the times specified by the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 當命令完成時，SynchronizeApps 是在由工作觸發程序所指定之時間執行的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Create a repeating job trigger
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 建立重複的工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: This command creates a job trigger that runs a job every 60 minutes for 48 hours beginning on September 12, 2013 at 1:00 a.m.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立工作觸發程序，此工作觸發程序會在從 2013 年 9 月 12 日上午 1:00 開始的 48 小時內，每隔 60 分鐘執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Stop a repeating job trigger
trans-unit.target: 範例 9︰ 停止重複的工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: This command forcibly stops the SecurityCheck job, which is triggered to run every 60 minutes until its job trigger expires.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會強制停止 SecurityCheck 工作，此工作是觸發為每隔 60 分鐘執行一次，直到其工作觸發程序過期。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the job from repeating, the command uses the Get-JobTrigger to get the job trigger of the SecurityCheck job and the Set-JobTrigger cmdlet to change the repetition interval and repetition duration of the job trigger to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要防止重複的工作，此命令會使用 Get-jobtrigger 來取得 SecurityCheck 工作和 Set-jobtrigger cmdlet 來變更重複間隔的工作觸發程序和零 (0) 的工作觸發程序重複期間。

trans-unit.source: Example 10: Create an hourly job trigger
trans-unit.target: 範例 10︰ 建立每小時的工作觸發程序

trans-unit.source: The following command creates a job trigger that runs a scheduled job once every 12 hours for an indefinite period of time.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會建立工作觸發程序，此工作觸發程序會以無終止時間的方式每隔 12 小時執行排程工作。

trans-unit.source: The schedule begins tomorrow (9/21/2012) at midnight (0:00 AM).
trans-unit.target: 該排程是從明天 (9/21/2012) 午夜 (上午 0:00) 開始。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -At
trans-unit.target: 在

trans-unit.source: Starts the job at the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的日期和時間啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one that the Get-Date cmdlet returns, or a string that can be converted to a date and time, such as "April 19, 2012 15:00", "12/31", or "3am".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date 指令程式傳回，或可以轉換成日期和時間，例如字串"April 19，2012年 15:00"、"12/31"或"3am"。

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify an element of the date, such as the year, the date in the trigger has the corresponding element from the current date.
trans-unit.target: 若未指定日期的元素 (例如年)，觸發程序中的日期會具有與目前日期對應的元素。

trans-unit.source: When using the **Once** parameter, set the value of the **At** parameter to a future date and time.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 **一次** 參數的值設定 **在** 未來的日期和時間的參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the default date in a **DateTime** object is the current date, if you specify a time before the current time without an explicit date, the job trigger is created for a time in the past.
trans-unit.target: 因為中的預設日期 **DateTime** 物件是目前的日期，如果您指定的時間，而不需要明確的日期為目前時間之前，工作觸發程序會建立在過去的時間。

trans-unit.source: **DateTime** objects, and strings that are converted to **DateTime** objects, are automatically adjusted to be compatible with the date and time formats selected for the local computer in **Region and Language** in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: **DateTime** 物件和字串轉換成 **DateTime** 物件，會自動調整選取本機電腦中的日期和時間格式與 **地區和語言** 控制台] 中。

trans-unit.source: -AtLogOn
trans-unit.target: -AtLogOn

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job when the specified users log on to the computer.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的使用者登入電腦時啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: To specify a user, use the **User** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定使用者，使用 **使用者** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -AtStartup
trans-unit.target: -AtStartup

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job when Windows starts.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 啟動時啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -Daily
trans-unit.target: -每日

trans-unit.source: Specifies a recurring daily job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定每日週期性工作排程。

trans-unit.source: Use the other parameters in the Daily parameter set to specify the schedule details.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Daily 參數中的其他參數來指定排程詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: -DaysInterval
trans-unit.target: -DaysInterval

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of days between occurrences on a daily schedule.
trans-unit.target: 在每日排程上指定執行週期間隔天數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 3 starts the scheduled job on days 1, 4, 7 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3 的值會在第 1、4、7 天啟動排程工作，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: -DaysOfWeek
trans-unit.target: -DaysOfWeek

trans-unit.source: Specifies the days of the week on which a weekly scheduled job runs.
trans-unit.target: 指定每週排程工作要在星期幾執行。

trans-unit.source: Enter day names, such as "Monday" or integers 0-6, where 0 represents Sunday.
trans-unit.target: 輸入星期幾名稱，例如 "Monday" 或 0-6 之間的整數，其中 0 代表 Sunday。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required in the Weekly parameter set.
trans-unit.target: 在 Weekly 參數集中，此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Day names are converted to their integer values in the job trigger.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 星期幾名稱會轉換成其工作觸發程序中的整數值。

trans-unit.source: When you enclose day names in quotation marks in a command, enclose each day name in separate quotation marks, such as "Monday", "Tuesday".
trans-unit.target: 當您在命令中將星期幾名稱放在引號中時，請將每個星期幾名稱放在各自的引號中，例如 "Monday"、"Tuesday"。

trans-unit.source: If you enclose multiple day names in a single quotation mark pair, the corresponding integer values are summed.
trans-unit.target: 若將多個星期幾名稱放在一組引號中，則會加總對應的整數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, "Monday, Tuesday" (1, 2) results in a value of "Wednesday" (3).
trans-unit.target: 例如，"Monday, Tuesday" (1, 2) 會產生 "Wednesday" (3) 的值。

trans-unit.source: -Once
trans-unit.target: 一次

trans-unit.source: Specifies a non-recurring (one time) or custom repeating schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定非週期性 (一次性) 或自訂重複性排程。

trans-unit.source: To create a repeating schedule, use the **Once** parameter with the **RepetitionDuration** and **RepetitionInterval** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立重複的排程，請使用 **一次** 參數 **RepetitionDuration** 和 **RepetitionInterval** 參數。

trans-unit.source: -RandomDelay
trans-unit.target: -RandomDelay

trans-unit.source: Enables a random delay that begins at the scheduled start time, and sets the maximum delay value.
trans-unit.target: 啟用排定的開始時間前的隨機延遲，並設定最大延遲值。

trans-unit.source: The length of the delay is set pseudo-randomly for each start and varies from no delay to the time specified by the value of this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 延遲長度是在每次開始前隨機設定，其值介於無延遲到此參數值所指定的時間之間。

trans-unit.source: The default value, zero (00:00:00), disables the random delay.
trans-unit.target: 預設值零 (00:00:00) 會停用隨機延遲。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one returned by the New-TimeSpan cmdlet, or enter a value in \<hours\>:\<minutes\>:\<seconds\> format, which is automatically converted to a timespan object.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如由 New-timespan cmdlet，或輸入值 \<小時\>:\<分鐘\>:\<秒\> 格式，會自動轉換為 timespan 物件。

trans-unit.source: -RepeatIndefinitely
trans-unit.target: -RepeatIndefinitely

trans-unit.source: This parameter, available starting in Windows PowerShell 4.0, eliminates the necessity of specifying a **TimeSpan.MaxValue** value for the **RepetitionDuration** parameter to run a scheduled job repeatedly, for an indefinite period.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數，可開始在 Windows PowerShell 4.0 中，就不需要指定 **TimeSpan.MaxValue** 值 **RepetitionDuration** 無期限，重複執行排程的工作的參數。

trans-unit.source: -RepetitionDuration
trans-unit.target: -Timespan.maxvalue

trans-unit.source: Repeats the job until the specified time expires.
trans-unit.target: 重複執行工作，直到經過指定的時間。

trans-unit.source: The repetition frequency is determined by the value of the **RepetitionInterval** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 重複頻率由值決定 **RepetitionInterval** 參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of **RepetitionInterval** is 5 minutes and the value of **RepetitionDuration** is 2 hours, the job is triggered every five minutes for two hours.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果值 **RepetitionInterval** 是 5 分鐘到數 **RepetitionDuration** 是 2 小時，工作會觸發兩個小時內每隔五分鐘。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one that the New-TimeSpan cmdlet returns or a string that can be converted to a timespan object, such as "1:05:30".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如一 New-timespan cmdlet 會傳回，或可以轉換為 timespan 物件，例如字串"1: 05:30 」。

trans-unit.source: To run a job indefinitely, add the **RepeatIndefinitely** parameter instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要無限期地執行工作，加入 **RepeatIndefinitely** 參數改。

trans-unit.source: To stop a job before the job trigger repetition duration expires, use the Set-JobTrigger cmdlet to set the **RepetitionDuration** value to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要停止工作，工作觸發程序重複期間過期之前，使用 Set-jobtrigger 指令程式來設定 **RepetitionDuration** 值為零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when the **Once**, **At** and **RepetitionInterval** parameters are used in the command.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是時才有效 **一次**, ，**在** 和 **RepetitionInterval** 命令中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: -RepetitionInterval
trans-unit.target: -RepetitionInterval

trans-unit.source: Repeats the job at the specified time interval.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的時間間隔重複執行工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the value of this parameter is 2 hours, the job is triggered every two hours.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若此參數的值是設定為 2 小時，則每隔兩小時會觸發一次工作。

trans-unit.source: The default value, 0, does not repeat the job.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 0 不會重複執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one that the New-TimeSpan cmdlet returns or a string that can be converted to a timespan object, such as "1:05:30".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如一 New-timespan cmdlet 會傳回，或可以轉換為 timespan 物件，例如字串"1: 05:30 」。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when the **Once**, **At**, and **RepetitionDuration** parameters are used in the command.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是時才有效 **一次**, ，**在**, ，和 **RepetitionDuration** 命令中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: -User
trans-unit.target: 使用者

trans-unit.source: Specifies the users who trigger an **AtLogon** start of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 指定觸發程序的使用者 **AtLogon** 啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of a user in \<UserName\> or \<Domain\Username\> format or enter an asterisk (*) to represent all users.
trans-unit.target: 輸入中的使用者名稱 \<UserName\> 或 \<網域 \ 使用者名稱\> 格式化，或輸入星號 （*） 代表所有使用者。

trans-unit.source: The default value is all users.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是所有使用者。

trans-unit.source: -Weekly
trans-unit.target: -每週

trans-unit.source: Specifies a recurring weekly job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定週期性每週工作排程。

trans-unit.source: Use the other parameters in the Weekly parameter set to specify the schedule details.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Weekly 參數中的其他參數來指定排程詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: -WeeksInterval
trans-unit.target: -WeeksInterval

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of weeks between occurrences on a weekly job schedule.
trans-unit.target: 指定每週工作排程的週次。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 3 starts the scheduled job on weeks 1, 4, 7 and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3 的值會在第 1、4、7 週啟動排程工作，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobTrigger

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: Job triggers are not saved to disk.
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序不會儲存到磁碟。

trans-unit.source: However, scheduled jobs are saved to disk, and you can use the Get-JobTrigger to get the job trigger of any scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 不過，排程的工作會儲存到磁碟，以及您可以使用 Get-jobtrigger 來取得任何排程工作的工作觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: **New-JobTrigger** does not prevent you from creating a job trigger that will not run a scheduled job, such as one-time trigger for a date in the past.
trans-unit.target: **新 JobTrigger** 不會阻止您建立工作觸發程序，將不會執行排定的工作，例如過去日期的一次性觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: The Register-ScheduledJob cmdlet accepts a ScheduledJobTrigger object, such as one returned by the **New-JobTrigger** or Get-JobTrigger cmdlets, or a hash table with trigger values.
trans-unit.target: Register-scheduledjob cmdlet 接受 ScheduledJobTrigger 物件，例如由 **New-jobtrigger** Get-jobtrigger cmdlet 或觸發程序值的雜湊資料表。

trans-unit.source: To submit a hash table, use the following keys.
trans-unit.target: 若要提交雜湊表，請使用下列索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: @{Frequency="Once" (or Daily, Weekly, AtStartup, AtLogon);At="3am" (or any valid time string); DaysOfWeek="Monday", "Wednesday" (or any combination of day names); Interval=2 (or any valid frequency interval); RandomDelay="30minutes" (or any valid timespan string); User="Domain1\User01 (or any valid user; used only with the AtLogon frequency value) }
trans-unit.target: @{Frequency="Once" (或 Daily、Weekly、AtStartup、AtLogon);At="3am" (或任何有效的時間字串); DaysOfWeek="Monday"、"Wednesday" (或星期幾名稱的任意組合); Interval=2 (或任何有效的頻率間隔); RandomDelay="30minutes" (或任何有效 timespan 字串); User="Domain1\User01 (或任何有效的使用者；只能搭配 AtLogon 頻率值使用) }

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
